about_the_game:
Welcome to our dark future, where the top of the world is run by greedy corporations and the bottom of the world is run by wild underground gangs.

CYBER DUNGEONZ RPG combines the classic hack and slash rpg combat system, an interesting non-linear crpg story, and a deep atmosphere of futuristic dystopian cyberpunk.

Main features of the game:

  • Classic hack'n'slash dungeon crawler gameplay in a futuristic cyberpunk atmosphere
  • Isometric camera
  • Detective storyline
  • Side story missions
  • Inventory & stash
  • Vendors
  • CyberPets
  • CyberPotions
  • Item crafting
  • Skill tree
  • Stats & buffs system

You will have to start at the bottom, with the illegal undergrounds, and gradually work your way up to the evil corporations and the secret forces that rule the planet.



Meet all kinds of weirdo enemies and accomplish challenging missions. You'll see the types of oddball gangs you haven't seen anywhere else before.



You will have to change the course of human history. Whether you can do it or not will depend only on you and your choices.



*CYBER DUNGEONZ RPG is completely story-driven, there are no "raid 100 generated similar dungeons" missions. All levels in the game are handcrafted.

name: CYBER DUNGEONZ RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G6950 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: CYBER DUNGEONZ RPG is hack'n'slash detective crpg with interesting plot, awesome music and cyberpunk atmosphere. You are a member of an underground hacker group operating in our dark future.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
